title: Person dies following shooting near Kennedy Road and the 401 - CityNews Toronto
content:
A person has died following a shooting near Kennedy Road and Highway 401, police say.
Police said they were called to the Antrim Crescent area just after 6 p.m. Saturday for reports of a shooting.
